entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
